item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: Privacy Policy Last updated: May 10, 2021 This Privacy Policy describes Our policies and procedures on the collection, use and disclosure of Your information when You use the Service and tells You about Your privacy rights and how the law protects You. We use Your Personal data to provide and improve the Service. By using the Service, You agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.

item.title: Contact
item.description: You can contact us by sending an email to villaprenc@gmail.com or by using the contact form bellow Your email: Subject:Message:Submit

item.title: Location
item.description: Villa Prenc is set in Matulji, Šmogorska cesta 13a. It is 5 km from Opatija and 15 km from Rijeka. Nearest beach is 3km and nearest airport is 40 km away from the house

item.title: About
item.description: Villa Prenc is a modern, newly built house in the center of Matulji, 3km from the nearest beach. It provides three bedrooms with own bathrooms, fully equiped kitchen, pool, big garden with children playground, table tennis, outdoor grill, a tavern with a wine collection and much more. We can accommodate up to 8 guests At your disposal you have four beautiful terraces for relax and enjoy the beautiful sunset with a glass of good wine.
